article.Heading: Budget 2016: Buy ONGC, Hindalco; sell BEL, TVS Motor: Sudarshan Sukhani
article.Summary: Sudarshan Sukhani of s2analytics.com is of the view that one can buy ONGC and Hindalco Industries and advises selling TVS Motor and BEL.
article.Body:
Sudarshan Sukhani of s2analytics.com told CNBC-TV18, "Oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC) and Hindalco Industries are buying ideas. The charts are supportive, so irrespective of what China is doing or what crude could do, I think ONGC and Hindalco so far are giving a sense of a rally that is likely to continue."

"Sell Bharat Electronics. The stock is making lower highs, lower lows and underperforming the Nifty as well. Nifty is not doing anything anyway. So, there is a consistent downtrend here and the same applies to Godrej Industries – lower highs, lower lows and underperforming, so you keep on selling it," he said.

"TVS Motor has a disturbing chart because it has not underperformed yet but it is in a very large consolidation. My assumption is that this would break on the upside has been bellied. It is actually now almost on the verge of a breaking on the downside and has been an outperformer. So, if TVS breaks on the downside which is what the charts are suggesting, that is disappointing. However, it is a short sell."
